Name: Cartonnage
Description: A piece of cartonnage from a coffin. At the top a winged goddess kneels and below her is a scene depicting the deceased as a mummy lying on a bier attended by Anubis or a priest dressed as the god. Under the bier are four canopic jars and to either side are the four Sons of Horus. Above the body hovers the Ba-bird. A figure to the left, partially obliterated but probably the wife of the deceased, stands in an attitude of lament.
